description: When asked to modernise and have barcodes on stock of sweets Elizabeth Lihou said "I couldn't do it".
title: Guernsey Victorian shop manager quits over adding barcodes
title_page: Guernsey Victorian shop manager quits over adding barcodes - BBC News
maintext: Mrs Lihou, who described herself as the shop's "manageress", said her role for more than a decade had covered everything from "clearing the shop in the morning to doing the banking at the end of the week".
